meaningMnemonic: When something is <radical>heavy</radical>, you need a lot of <radical>power</radical> to <kanji>move</kanji> it. It’s not going to move unless you use a lot of power. That thing is heavy and unless you use all the power you got, it’s not moving.
readingMnemonic: Remember that 1 ton weight? Well, actually it’s a <reading>dou</reading>ghnut (どう). A huge, massive, 1 ton doughnut. It’s super heavy and hard to move, but it’s delicious.
